Reviews.Title: Fantastic TV, Great Price
Reviews.Author: Jacob Kass
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV around a month ago. It arrived well-packaged and protected. No dead pixels.The TV performs great. the picture is sharp and the colors are bright. it is of a good size for several people to view, though obviously, at 32", this is not the world's largest screen. But it is sharp and stylish and for $200 (price i paid on Amazon) it is a great TV choice.

Reviews.Title: Great tv
Reviews.Author: K. Kozla "believer"
Reviews.Content: The picture is amazing, the sound is great and for the price I couldn't be happier.  This is just a wonderful product, I love that the plugs are on the side not the back as it makes it easier to reach and I couldn't be happier with my purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price of $180.00!
Reviews.Author: Don Juan "Donnie"
Reviews.Content: I am very pleased with the picture quality of this TV since I have three 1080p TV's already. No complaints whatsoever even if it was made in China.

Reviews.Title: Great TV and Fantastic price of $185.62
Reviews.Author: S. Mears
Reviews.Content: Bought this just after New Years for great price of $206.24. A day or 2 later, price dropped to $185.62  I took advantage of lower price guarantee and Amazon refunded me the difference. Price now is about $279.00  Got a great deal. I am a big fan of RCA tvs. Bought a 36" big screen (big tube) back in 1990 and it lasted up to just a couple years ago when a mover damaged it while moving. Probably would still be working. Bought a flat screen 26" RCA about 4 years ago and it is still working perfect. I understand this model is made by OM corp so hopefully it is just as well made. My only suggestion would be to make the clock work both 12 and 24 hr format. Only has 24 hr format. Also my RCA I bought 4 years ago had ability to label each input so you could easily tell what is connected to each input. Example HDMI 1-Directv, Composite 1- WII, etc. This model doesnt have that feature for input, but does have channel label. Channel label doesnt help if you dont use air or cable input since Directv is connected to HDMI. Very happy with very nice picture and sound. Easy to use on screen menus. Just wish menus would not disappear after a few seconds if no activity. Cant go wrong with this tv.

Reviews.Title: All Good
Reviews.Author: Falsesmall
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my son's bedroom. Caught it on an Amazon sale for $185.00. Are you  kidding me?? Frankly this TV would get a 5 star review even at the "regular" amazon price of $279.99. The picture clarity is just about perfect with HDMI connection. Sound is good. I have a ProScan in another room which is manufactured by the same company. I was hoping this TV would match that one for quality. It seems to have surpassed it. The stand is solid and it is a good looking all black TV. It came with free shipping and arrived 3 days after I ordered it. Very pleased with this product, and Amazon, with their fine service.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Ruth
Reviews.Content: I must say this is a great TV. I bought it for my Grandson. He said it's awesome.The piture is great and the sound. Amazon is a great place to save money and get fast delivery.

Reviews.Title: Very good TV!!
Reviews.Author: R. L. Johnson
Reviews.Content: When I looked at this TV on the Amazon website there were only 2 reviews and both were excellent ratings. The price was right. $206.00 and there were only 2 left. I wished I bought both of them! Very fast delivery! When I received the set, set up was just connecting the wires and pushing a button on the remote, quick and fast.Very good picture and sound, lots of inputs and outputs. I would buy again. just watch for specials that seem to come and go daily. Picture quality is sharp and sound is clear!

Reviews.Title: Works Great for the Price!
Reviews.Author: Karen A. Lewis
Reviews.Content: Inexpensive with a fantastic HD picture and good sound if you're not looking for surround-sound level quality. I'm content with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Christmas present
Reviews.Author: PanzyNU2
Reviews.Content: I bought is last Christmas and the TV is awesome.It has a great picture, color and sound. Grand Pa  loves it.

Reviews.Title: Very Good TV
Reviews.Author: EB12
Reviews.Content: This TV is really Nice. I got it for a great price. The Quality of picture is great really clean good colors. some complain about sound on this model but i find the sound to be OK. its no surround sound but I didn't pay surround sound prices for this set so it will do just fine for my needs. Would buy it again if I needed 1

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this tv
Reviews.Author: Thaynes Escalona
Reviews.Content: Start using it And with in 2 month the control remote stop working, And no other universal control remote worked. Because the reciving sensor on the tv was broke

Reviews.Title: Works great!
Reviews.Author: Emily
Reviews.Content: We have been using this tv for awhile now, it has great picture quality. It does go up to 1080p on the PS3 and Xbox which is nice.  I like that you are able to label the channels since we have not hooked up a DirecTV box hooked up to it as of yet to use as a guide.

Reviews.Title: 32" RCA LCD TV, Glad I took the chance!
Reviews.Author: Arthur J. Parks
Reviews.Content: I've only had this TV for about a month, but so far I'm super impressed! Very Good Picture! Easy set up. I would buy this TV again. Amazon is awesome too! Only took 3 days to get here. Quite fast don't you think. No extra charge either! Thanks Amazon!!!!

Reviews.Title: HD 720 TV
Reviews.Author: Tom F
Reviews.Content: This set is very affordable and gives great picture quality.  The audio is a bit weak but acceptable. Would recommend it to anyone wanting a mid-sized 720 HDTV for a cheap price.  Good going RCA.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Kevin A. Tuck
Reviews.Content: I've had RCAs before and planned to enjoy this one as much. Installation became a problem when, while trying to screw in the coax cable, the coax connection fell off the tv into my hand. I don't appreciate paying close to $300 for parts to fall off. The side view above is not for the tv listed. There aren't that many connections on this tv (only 2 hdmi and 1 set or rca). It also comes with a universal remote to operate a dvd and a manual with fine print saying that the dvd portion of the remote does not work with this tv.

Reviews.Title: Third time's a charm.
Reviews.Author: Lori Jean Martin
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV because it got excellet customer reviews and the price was right.  The first TV had a sound problem.  Voices intermittently sounded tinny and then this problem became more prevalent.  The remote for the second TV did not work right out of the box.  I have had the third TV for a little over two weeks and have had no problems at all.  I cannot blame the manufacturer for everything, as I think the delivery carrier could also be responsible.  TV was left upside down on porch : ((Good, sharp picture, easy to set-up and good sound.  I live in a very small house, 525 sq. ft. and sound quality is good for the space, both in living room and bedroom.  Even though I had problems with first two, I would recommend this TV because I have had no problems so far with current TV.

Reviews.Title: RCA 32LB30RQ 32[inch LCD
Reviews.Author: verra morgan
Reviews.Content: Does not take too much space and the picture resolution and sound are perfect.  Highly recommended for a smaller room.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: millerboy
Reviews.Content: got it for a friend the purchased and the shipping went well , it arrived in very good condition .

Reviews.Title: AWESOME BARGAIN
Reviews.Author: SHERYL L. WIRTH
Reviews.Content: GREAT PRICE FOR A GREAT PRODUCT! CHEAPER THAN ANY DEALS AVAILABLE AT THE TIME OF PURCHASE. QUALITY SUPERB AND RECEIVED IN GREAT TIME.

Reviews.Title: RCA TV
Reviews.Author: Betty C. Russell
Reviews.Content: Great, no problems, only having to put a certain number of words, this is crazy, but here are two more words.

Reviews.Title: I like this TV
Reviews.Author: Kevin Radzak
Reviews.Content: Who doesn't like tv right?  I've only got nine more words required and then I'll be able to stop this r

32 - Inch LCD HDTV
2 HDMI Connections
Resolution: 1366 x 768
Tuner Mode: ATSC/NTSC
